name: Law Office of C. Burt Newell Reviews

review.title: “Worked as a legal intern for two summers. Transcribed dictation, composed interrogatories, witnessed depositions.”
review.pros: Pros – Learned an immense amount in a short period of time. Everyone was very willing to teach me everything I was interested in learning.
review.cons: Cons – Would have liked more hours.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
